description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to strengthen the institutional performance of Mauritania's targeted local governments in order to improve their capacity to deliver services.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Economic Affairs and Development

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 2, E.2 | Description :Furnish to the Association, as soon as available, but in any case notlater than November 30 of each year, the annual work plans and budgets, for their review and approval; except for the annual workplan and budget for the Project for the first year of Project implementation which shall be furnished no later than one (1) monthafter the Effective Date. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A.2, c | Description :If, in the views of the Association, the environmental and socialsafeguard specialist in the Project Coordination Unit is considered as having insufficient experience in the implementation ofTriggered Bank Safeguard Policies, (s)he shall be trained in a manner acceptable to the Association, no later than six (6) monthsafter the Effective Date. | Due Date :22-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A.2, c | Description :Recruitment of an additional procurement specialist (to be trainedno later than 6 months after effectiveness); and a capacity support adviser for the PCU. | Due Date :22-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B.1 (b) (ii) | Description :Deposit into Project Account A and Project Account B,respectively, the amount indicated in the corresponding Annual Work Plan and Budget (due February 15 and July 15 of each year) |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B.1 (c) | Description :Recruit a number of teams of independent experts in areas ofexpertise acceptable to the Association (Independent Performance Assessors). | Due Date :15-Jan-2014
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B.1 (d) | Description :Adoption of the Performance Assessment Manual | Due Date:30-Nov-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B.1 (e) (i) | Description :Confirm eligibility of each targeted local governmentparticipating in Part 1 of the project on the basis of an update of their results | Due Date :31-Aug-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B.1 (e) (ii) | Description :Performance Assessment completed (report with recommendationon annual allocation to be submitted to the Association for review andno-objection) | Due Date :30-Jun-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B.2, a and b | Description :Establishment of mobile teams of experts recruited on thebasis of terms of reference, qualifications and experience satisfactory to the Association and the Mobile Teams have started theiroperations. | Due Date :22-Jul-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, G.3 | Description :Evidence that an amount not lower than MRO 2,000,000,000 has been paidby the Recipient into the PA A and allocated to the financing of Conditional Performance Grants for the financing of LocalGovernments 2013 FY budget, and an amount not lower than MRO 500,000,000 has been paid into the PA B and allocated to thefinancing of capacity strengthening and Project management activities during FY13. | Due Date :22-Apr-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, G.4 | Description :Provide evidence that the draft budget law describing the Recipient'sannual budget for the next fiscal year submitted to the parliament for enactment reflects a proposal to finance ConditionalPerformance Grants and other Project activities as reflected in the annual work plan and budget, as well as the RegionalDevelopment Fund in an amount satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B.1 (b) | Description :Provide for the Coordination Unit, install and program hardwareand an accounting software | Due Date :22-Jun-2014
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B.4 | Description :Recruitment of the independent auditors for the annual financialaudits of the Project | Due Date :22-Sep-2014
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II, B.5 | Description :Submit an Independent financial and physical audit of the activitiesof the targeted local governments | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III, E | Description :Training on the Procurement Guidelines and the Consultant Guidelinesto the all members of the Procurement Sector Boards who do nothave, in the views of the Association, sufficient experience in theProcurement Guidelines and the Consultant Guidelines. | Due Date :22-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Section 5.01 (a) of the FA | Description :Effectiveness condition: Recruitment of (i) a Project coordinator;(ii) an administrative and financial specialist; (iii) one senior procurement specialist;(iv) one monitoring and evaluationspecialist; and (v) one environmental and social safeguard specialist. | Due Date :22-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :Section 5.01 (b) of the FA | Description :Effectiveness condition: Adoption and dissemination of (i) the ProjectImplementation Manual, (ii) the Procurement Manual for Contracts under the Level of Competency of the Procurement Sector Board, and(iii) Simplified Local Government Guidelines for the Implementation of the Program. | Due Date :22-Mar-2014
